title: Insane frame rate jumping

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: At launch of every patch or hot fix this season, I have been getting ridiculous frame jumping making the game unplayable. When i do re-installations of the game it seems to fix it, but then it gets broken again after a patch or hot fix. Repairs don't fix it, changing graphics settings don't fix it.

replies.body:
Sounds like something's going wrong with your patching process if that's the case.

Try some of these steps first:

* Run as Admin (always) - https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq3 (you can set to always run as administrator in the compatibility settings)
* Update your graphics card drivers
* Temporarily disable your antivirus (while it patches)
* Temporarily disable firewall (while it patches) - https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq7
* Switch to a wired connection - https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq2

If none of those work I'd recommend submitting a ticket to player support.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
